title: My kid drank from a fricking moldy bottle. What do I do.
body: Keep an eye for the poops for 24 hours. Don't shoot yourself. missgiddy. •. I'm not a parent but from time to time I'll discover my Nalgene bottle is blooming with mold. It's a dark colored bottle so it's easy to miss. I just gag a little then bleach it. I'm still alive! :)
